import React,{useEffect}from'react';import'./Services.css';import{ServicesCards}from'./ServicesCards';import'primeicons/primeicons.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Services=()=>{// Add scroll reveal animation for service cards
